def_en: Carrots are long, thin, orange-coloured vegetables. They grow under the ground, and have green shoots above the ground.

def_cn: (为鼓励别人做某事而提供的)好处,甜头（同一个句子里用以表示劝阻别人不要做某事的东西叫做stick）
def_en: See also:carrot and stick; Something that is offered to people in order to persuade them to do something can be referred to as a carrot. Something that is meant to persuade people not to do something can be referred to in the same sentence as a 'stick'.
